replies.body: This actually made me giggle, but there's a good reason for writing it in the chat: this way you get a timestamp with it, so you know the approximate time when you can expect him to be able to ult again.

> [{quoted}](name=Disulfiram,realm=EUW,application-id=Ir7ZrJjF,discussion-id=JEYhaEbz,comment-id=0000,timestamp=2018-04-20T09:33:31.018+0000)
>
> This actually made me giggle, but there's a good reason for writing it in the chat: this way you get a timestamp with it, so you know the approximate time when you can expect him to be able to ult again.

the actual reason is that you don't want to be flamed by your team for dying so you ping their ults and summs to make them think they used a lot on you
/s

Lmao I love seeing this. 

Sometimes it's even "Velkoz no E" as if that justifies them dying

> [{quoted}](name=Zed genius,realm=EUNE,application-id=Ir7ZrJjF,discussion-id=JEYhaEbz,comment-id=00000001,timestamp=2018-04-21T07:39:01.632+0000)
>
> the actual reason is that you don't want to be flamed by your team for dying so you ping their ults and summs to make them think they used a lot on you
> /s

If they have ignite, I ping it 5 times

> [{quoted}](name=Disulfiram,realm=EUW,application-id=Ir7ZrJjF,discussion-id=JEYhaEbz,comment-id=0000,timestamp=2018-04-20T09:33:31.018+0000)
>
> This actually made me giggle, but there's a good reason for writing it in the chat: this way you get a timestamp with it, so you know the approximate time when you can expect him to be able to ult again.

A giggle? This made me laugh XD
A little embarassing when it takes oneself several seconds to get.

*A haunting distant voice from the grave*

"No shit Sherlock!......"

Could be relevant if someone was dead when it was casted and not watching the fights elsewhere.

Noct ult is just sorta unmissable unless you were alt tabbed.
you can still have vision of eve when you're playing against her, even if you're incapable of tracking junglers. you ward camps when you're against eve

Hey, by the way, in case you missed it:

Karthus and Kled *also* ulted.
Oh man, thanks bro. I almost missed that Karthus ult being used. Don't forget that Jayce used ulti too

Hey, you're welcome. It's easy to miss.

Oh, shit, Jayce used his ult? Well, I'll come quickly roam, while it's down.
yea but you don't get a timestamp when noc ults unless you call it

{{champion:99}} also ulted....

no, wait she ulted again!

oh fk shes ulting agai-

**you have been slain**

**aced**
